snippet: In Brooklyn they do drag a little differently, as Stephanie Keith found out when she shot the second annual Mr(s) Williamsburg competition, a nine-week extravaganza where anything goes.
abstract: Stephanie Keith photographs contestants at Mr(s) Williamsburg drag queen competition in Brooklyn, contest that celebrates weirdness in cross-dressing.
lead_paragraph: In Brooklyn they do drag a little differently, as Stephanie Keith found out when she shot the second annual Mr(s) Williamsburg competition, a nine-week extravaganza where anything goes.
